content: st join with slip_stitch into ch1 space 22 st round 15 chain 1 single_crochet in next 21 st join with slip_stitch into chain 1 space 22 st seeds using black yarn and darning needle stitch in seeds round 16 chain 1 invdec 3sc invdec single_crochet in next 4 st invdec 3sc invdec single_crochet in next 4 st join with slip_stitch into ch1 space 18 st round 17 chain 1 invdec single_crochet invdec single_crochet in next 4 st invdec single_crochet invdec single_crochet in next 4 st join with slip_stitch into ch1 space 14 st round 18 chain 1 invdec single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 st invdec single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 st join with slip_stitch into ch1 space 12 st tie off and cut yarn leaving a tail about 30 cm stuff slice with darning needle use tail of red yarn to close opening across top of slice
